import React from 'react'; import Axios from 'axios'; import { Col, Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText, Table } from 'reactstrap'; class Profile extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { pharma2: [], selectedID: null } } componentDidMount() { this.getData() } getData = () => { Axios.get('http://localhost:3300/getProfile') .then(res => { console.log(res.data) this.setState({ pharma2 : res.data }) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) } printData = () => { return this.state.pharma2.map((item, index) => { if (this.state.selectedID !== index) { return ( {index + 1} {item.username} {item.e} {item.email} {item.berat} {item.kota} {item.tahun} {item.posisi} ) } else { return ( {index + 1} this.newnama = newnama} defaultValue={item.nama} /> this.newusia = newusia} defaultValue={item.usia} /> this.newemail = newemail} defaultValue={item.email} /> this.newberat = newberat} defaultValue={item.berat} /> this.newkota = newkota} defaultValue={item.kota} /> this.newtahun = newtahun} defaultValue={item.tahun} /> this.newposisi = newposisi}> {this.state.selectedID == null ? <> : <>} ) } }) } render() { // console.log( this.posisi) return (
this.nama = nama} /> this.usia = usia} /> this.email = email} /> this.berat = berat} /> this.kota = kota} /> this.tahun = tahun} /> this.posisi = posisi}>
{this.printData()}
# Nama Usia Email Berat Kota Tahun Posisi Action
); } } export default Profile;
